ygData.subject: C++ Client, CTI conversion to XML fails
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello: I am developing a C++ Cantera client.  I am seeing directory depth effect the ability of the python interpreter to produce the XML file from a CTI file.

Hello:

I am developing a C++ Cantera client.  I am seeing directory depth =

effect the ability of the python interpreter to produce the XML file 
from=
 a CTI file.  If I run a python script in the same directory it 
works prop=
erly.

If I use 
'C:\Cantera\demos\Python\equilibrium' my code runs
using
'=
C:\Cantera\demos\Python\equilibrium\testdir_1' it fails with the 
following=

le "C:\DOCUME~1\bert\LOCALS~1\Temp/.cttmp1170284516.pyw", line 7,
